name: geography
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 the study of the systems and processes involved in the world's weather, mountains, seas, lakes, etc. and of the ways in which countries and people organize life within an area See also
physical geography the geography of somewhere
the way all the parts of an area are arranged within it: the geography of Australia
See more
More examplesFewer examplesa geography field tripMy favourite subjects at school were history and geography.

[ C ] plural geographies an area where a company operates or sells a product: The company added that there had been a "business slowdown in all geographies."
